Deprecated API

Contents

  • For Removal
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • For Removal 
    Element Description
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.BaseLogicalViewProjectPane​(Project, ProjectView)
    use BaseLogicalViewProjectPane(Project) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.TreeUpdateVisitor.addUpdate​(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    see TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.updates.AdditionalTextNodeUpdate
    Use TreeMessage with additional text
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.updates.TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate​(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    there are no uses of NodeUpdate, use TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate(MPSTreeNode) to request tree UI refresh/renew based on element properties already updated. XXX can remove it right away, as mbeddr got their own outdated copy, and no clients are expected to plug into this updater.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.ProjectPane.rebuildTree()
    use ProjectPane.rebuild() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getAggregatedErrorState()
    node's error state has been replaced with TreeErrorMessage
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getErrorState()
    see MPSTreeNode.setErrorState(ErrorState) for reasons ErrorState ain't no good
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getFontStyle()
    Using TextAttribute gives much more control over font
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.isErrorState()
    see MPSTreeNode.setErrorState(ErrorState) for reasons ErrorState ain't no good
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.propogateErrorUpwards()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setErrorState​(ErrorState)
    Error state without a message makes little sense. Tooltips as a way to communicate error messages suck. Use MPSTreeNode.addTreeMessage(TreeMessage) and TreeErrorMessage instead.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setFontStyle​(int)
    use MPSTreeNode.addFontAttribute(TextAttribute, Object) with TextAttribute.WEIGHT_BOLD or TextAttribute.POSTURE_OBLIQUE values
    jetbrains.mps.MPSPatchBaseDirectoryDetector
    jetbrains.mps.plugins.actions.LabelledAnchor.getId()
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.actions.ShowTutorialAction
    action OnlineDocAction from IntelliJ platform is used instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.choose.NavigationTargetScopeIterable​(SearchScope, SRepository)
    use NavigationTargetScopeIterable(SearchScope, MPSProject) instead as we need Project for NavigationParticipants
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    jetbrains.mps.fileTypes.MPSFileTypesManager
    this class has very limited perspective on what files are module/model (sticks to predefined set of filename extensions), do not use
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.treeholder.tree.TextOptions
    to remove without replacement XXX perhaps, could reuse to pass counter number to INodeRepresentator#getResultsText, though I hate naming of both classes
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.updates.AdditionalTextNodeUpdate
    Use TreeMessage with additional text
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.smodel.SModelEventsDispatcher
    Dispatches events using legacy SModelEvent classes and there's only 1 use (TreeStructureUpdate) which doesn't justify its existence User: Alexander Shatalin Date: 16.04.2010
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.SortUtil
    extract comparators, use them directly where needed and get rid of this class
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.IdeaFileSystem
    jetbrains.mps.MPSPatchBaseDirectoryDetector
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.actions.ShowTutorialAction
    action OnlineDocAction from IntelliJ platform is used instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    jetbrains.mps.icons.MPSIcons.ToolWindows.ClassHierarchyView
    jetbrains.mps.ide.actions.MPSCommonDataKeys.OPERATION_CONTEXT
    IOperationContext has been deprecated and will be removed in the next release
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.treeholder.treeview.path.PathItemRole.ROLE_CATEGORY
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.view.treeholder.treeview.ViewOptions.myCategory
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.dialogs.DeleteDialog.DeleteOption.enabled
    input parameter, will be hidden
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.dialogs.DeleteDialog.DeleteOption.selected
    input parameter, will be hidden. Use DeleteDialog.DeleteOption.isSelected() instead.
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.GROUP_ASPECTS_ICON
    use MPSIcons.Nodes.Models.AspectModel instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.OUTPUT
    use MPSIcons.Generator.Output instead
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.structureview.adds.icons.Icons.SORT_NODES_BY_ASPECT_ICON
    use AllIcons.ObjectBrowser.SortByType instead
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    jetbrains.mps.ide.messages.MessagesViewTool.getAvailableList​(String, boolean)
    I don't feel it's a nice idea to expose implementation detail, MessagesViewTool.newHandler() shall suffice, perhaps, augmented with options object to pass info/warn/clear settings
    jetbrains.mps.ide.MPSCoreComponents.getModuleRepository()
    it's our implementation part, shall drop once no uses
    jetbrains.mps.ide.project.ProjectHelper.toMPSProject​(Project)
    use ProjectHelper.fromIdeaProject(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.TreeUpdateVisitor.addUpdate​(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    see TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.highlighting.visitor.updates.TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate​(MPSTreeNode, NodeUpdate)
    there are no uses of NodeUpdate, use TreeNodeUpdater.addUpdate(MPSTreeNode) to request tree UI refresh/renew based on element properties already updated. XXX can remove it right away, as mbeddr got their own outdated copy, and no clients are expected to plug into this updater.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.logicalview.ProjectTree.expandProjectNode()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.NewRootNodeAction.trySelectInCurrentPane​(Project, SNode)
    use NewRootNodeAction.trySelectInCurrentPane(Project, SNode) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.ProjectPane.rebuildTree()
    use ProjectPane.rebuild() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getAggregatedErrorState()
    node's error state has been replaced with TreeErrorMessage
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getErrorState()
    see MPSTreeNode.setErrorState(ErrorState) for reasons ErrorState ain't no good
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getFontStyle()
    Using TextAttribute gives much more control over font
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.getIcon​(boolean)
    use MPSTreeNode.getIcon() instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.isErrorState()
    see MPSTreeNode.setErrorState(ErrorState) for reasons ErrorState ain't no good
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.iterator()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.propogateErrorUpwards()
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setErrorState​(ErrorState)
    Error state without a message makes little sense. Tooltips as a way to communicate error messages suck. Use MPSTreeNode.addTreeMessage(TreeMessage) and TreeErrorMessage instead.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setFontStyle​(int)
    use MPSTreeNode.addFontAttribute(TextAttribute, Object) with TextAttribute.WEIGHT_BOLD or TextAttribute.POSTURE_OBLIQUE values
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNode.setIcon​(Icon, boolean)
    use MPSTreeNode.setIcon(javax.swing.Icon) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.MPSTreeNodeEx.getSNode()
    Use of this method is discouraged, client code shall make no assumptions about SNode instance validity/accessibility. Instead, clients shall rely on MPSTreeNodeEx.getNodePointer() to find out associated node. However, subclasses may opt to keep SNode and access it as needed, they just have to avoid exposing SNode and ensure that MPSTreeNodeEx.getNodePointer() doesn't change so that external code has something to rely on.
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.getOrCreateVirtualFile​(IFile)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.getProjectVirtualFile​(IFile)
    please use IdeaFileSystem.asVirtualFile(IFile) instead. To get FS associated with the project, use MPSProject.getFileSystem().
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.getVirtualFile​(IFile)
    please use VirtualFileUtils.getProjectVirtualFile(IFile) or [if absolutely needed] VirtualFileUtils.getOrCreateVirtualFile(IFile)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.vfs.VirtualFileUtils.toIFile​(VirtualFile)
    Prefer IdeaFileSystem.fromVirtualFile(VirtualFile) instead. This method relies on global FS singleton.
    jetbrains.mps.migration.global.BaseProjectMigration.setExecuted​(Project)
    jetbrains.mps.plugins.actions.GeneratedActionGroup.addParameterizedAction​(BaseAction, PluginId, Object...)
    jetbrains.mps.plugins.actions.LabelledAnchor.getId()
    jetbrains.mps.project.StandaloneMPSProject.getErrors()
    remove in 3.4 and make final
    jetbrains.mps.refactoring.Renamer.renameModule​(AbstractModule, String, Project)
    use the one with return type
    jetbrains.mps.refactoring.Renamer.renameModuleWithSubModules​(AbstractModule, String, Project)
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    jetbrains.mps.FilteredGlobalScope()
    this cons assumes single global repository, which is a non-existent thing. Use FilteredGlobalScope(SRepository) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.findusages.model.scopes.GlobalScope()
    use GlobalScope(Project) instead. There are no more uses in MPS, please don't introduce any new one. However, we have to keep this code fore fe releases as there's 'execute finders' expression, which defaults to use of this scope when none is specified. Though we warn about unspecified scope now, it's unlikely to trigger prompt fixes in our clients. We need to change generator to use something more reasonable than new GS(), but I failed to come up with an idea what would it be (ProjectManager.allOpenProjects.collect(p->p.repo)?).
    jetbrains.mps.ide.projectPane.BaseLogicalViewProjectPane​(Project, ProjectView)
    use BaseLogicalViewProjectPane(Project) instead
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.dialogs.properties.ViewUsagesDeleteDialog​(Project, String, String)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.module.ProjectModuleTreeNode​(SModule)
    jetbrains.mps.ide.ui.tree.smodel.SNodeGroupTreeNode​(SModelTreeNode, String, boolean)
    use SNodeGroupTreeNode(SModelReference, String, boolean) counterpart
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.choose.NavigationTargetScopeIterable​(SearchScope, SRepository)
    use NavigationTargetScopeIterable(SearchScope, MPSProject) instead as we need Project for NavigationParticipants
    jetbrains.mps.workbench.dialogs.DeleteDialog​(Project, String, String, DeleteDialog.DeleteOption...)
    use DeleteDialog(com.intellij.openapi.project.Project, String, String, DeleteDialog.DeleteOption...) instead
